nodes.bodyText: Not needed since the findByIdWIth.... method already throws an exception in this case
Not needed since we fetch the course from the database a couple of lines before this check
The short name could still be empty or too short as we don’t have a database constraint here, I guess this check does not harm!
Can never be null, because Spring does not allow null values for @RequestBody (default behavior).
